docs.snippet: Police say officers in southeast Washington, D.C., shot a man who refused to drop a weapon that turned out to be a BB gun....

docs.snippet: Attorneys for a Minnesota police officer accused of fatally shooting a black man during a traffic stop say Philando Castile's gun was accessible and that he was reaching for it when he was killed....

docs.snippet: Canadian plane maker Bombardier Inc plans to double its fleet size in India to more than 40 aircraft over the next few years, an executive told Reuters on Wednesday on the sidelines of an aviation conference in Mumbai....

docs.snippet: Airbus said on Wednesday the company was shocked by and deeply regretted the technical issue that affected a new German A400M military transport and forced Defence Minister Ursula von der Leyen to use a replacement plane to travel back from Lithua...
docs.lead_paragraph: Airbus said on Wednesday the company was shocked by and deeply regretted the technical issue that affected a new German A400M military transport and forced Defence Minister Ursula von der Leyen to use a replacement plane to travel back from Lithuania on Tuesday.

headline.main: Airbus 'Shocked' by German A400M Issue, Supporting Investigation
